statements: SELECT id, subject_line FROM ab_testing_emails LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT subject_line, call_to_action, email_content FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE call_to_action = 'Buy Now';
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT subject_line, email_content FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE call_to_action = 'Sign Up' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT subject_line, call_to_action FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, subject_line, email_content FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE call_to_action IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, call_to_action, subject_line FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE email_content LIKE '%offer%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM A_B_Testing_Subject_Lines;
SELECT id, subject_line, call_to_action FROM A_B_Testing_Subject_Lines ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT email_content, call_to_action FROM A_B_Testing_Subject_Lines WHERE subject_line = 'Welcome';
SELECT SUM(opens_count) AS total_opens, SUM(clicks_count) AS total_clicks FROM Email_Campaign_Performance;
SELECT * FROM Email_Campaign_Performance WHERE conversions_count > 0 ORDER BY conversions_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM A_B_Testing_Subject_Lines ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT subject_line, email_content FROM A_B_Testing_Subject_Lines WHERE id > 5
SELECT * FROM Email_Campaign_Performance WHERE conversions_count > 0 ORDER BY clicks_count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT call_to_action FROM A_B_Testing_Subject_Lines
SELECT AVG(clicks_count) AS average_clicks FROM Email_Campaign_Performance
SELECT * FROM subject_lines;
SELECT subject_text FROM subject_lines WHERE subject_id = 1;
SELECT subject_id, subject_text FROM subject_lines ORDER BY subject_id DESC;
SELECT subject_text FROM subject_lines WHERE subject_text LIKE '%example%';
SELECT cta_text FROM calls_to_action WHERE cta_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM subject_lines ORDER BY subject_id DESC;
SELECT subject_text FROM subject_lines WHERE subject_id = 5;
SELECT email_id, content_text FROM email_content WHERE content_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT cta_text FROM calls_to_action WHERE cta_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT subject_id, subject_text FROM subject_lines WHERE subject_text = 'Welcome';
SELECT * FROM subject_lines;
SELECT email_title, email_body FROM email_content WHERE email_content_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT cta_text, cta_link FROM calls_to_action ORDER BY cta_id DESC;
SELECT subject_line_text FROM subject_lines WHERE subject_line_id = '887c7dfc-6a6d-4faa-9a68-f3568c179b13';
SELECT email_title, email_body, cta_text FROM email_content INNER JOIN calls_to_action ON email_content.email_content_id = calls_to_action.cta_id;
SELECT * FROM subject_lines;
SELECT email_title, email_body FROM email_content ORDER BY email_title ASC;
SELECT subject_line_text FROM subject_lines WHERE subject_line_id = '123456';
SELECT email_title, open_rate FROM email_content INNER JOIN campaign_performance ON email_content.email_content_id = campaign_performance.email_content_id;
SELECT cta_text, cta_link FROM calls_to_action WHERE cta_text LIKE '%Learn%';
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT subject_line, action FROM subject_lines, calls_to_action;
SELECT content FROM email_content WHERE id = 3;
SELECT campaign_date, open_rate, click_rate FROM email_campaigns JOIN campaign_performance ON email_campaigns.id = campaign_performance.email_campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM subject_lines WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM subject_lines;
SELECT id, subject_line FROM subject_lines ORDER BY subject_line DESC;
SELECT email_id, campaign_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, open_rate, conversion_rate FROM campaign_performance WHERE click_rate > 0.5;
SELECT subject_line, content, action FROM subject_lines JOIN email_content ON subject_lines.id = email_content.subject_line_id JOIN calls_to_action ON email_content.action_id = calls_to_action.id;
